com.hybris.cis.facade

Interface CisFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CisFacadeImpl

    public interface CisFacade

    A central entry point providing access to all managed services.

    A managed service instance can be executed using execute(CisExecutable, String)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <S extends CisService,R extends CisResult>
      R      		 execute(CisExecutable<S,R> execution, String requiredVendor)
      Prepares the given execution context, looks up a concrete service implementation and finally invokes the service.
      <S extends CisService>
      Pair<InputStream,String>      		 executeForInputStream(CisExecutable<S,Pair<InputStream,String>> execution, String requiredVendor)
      Prepares the given execution context for streaming, looks up a concrete service implementation and finally invokes the service.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        <S extends CisService,R extends CisResult> R execute(CisExecutable<S,R> execution,
                                                     String requiredVendor)
        Prepares the given execution context, looks up a concrete service implementation and finally invokes the service.
        Type Parameters:
        S - The type of the service to execute.
        R - The type of the return value
        Parameters:
        execution - The executable
        requiredVendor - Null or the id of the vendor which can be used to force a specific vendor implementation.
        Returns:
        The result of the service invocation.

      • executeForInputStream

        <S extends CisService> Pair<InputStream,String> executeForInputStream(CisExecutable<S,Pair<InputStream,String>> execution,
                                                                      String requiredVendor)
        Prepares the given execution context for streaming, looks up a concrete service implementation and finally invokes the service.
        Type Parameters:
        S - The type of the service to execute.
        Parameters:
        execution - The executable
        requiredVendor - Null or the id of the vendor which can be used to force a specific vendor implementation.
        Returns:
        A pair of InputStream and id
